title: I played 8 MORE Souls-Like games you've never heard of

media:group.media:title: I played 8 MORE Souls-Like games you've never heard of
media:group.media:description:
episode 11 of Steam Dumpster Diving with somehow, once again, even more "souls-likes" you (probably) haven't heard of
twitter: https://twitter.com/IronPineapple_
twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/iron_pineapple

TIMESTAMPS
0:00 Intro
0:24 CubeCube
4:04 ENCHAIN
8:51 UNSIGHTED
10:56 Starry Knight
14:33 Project Lilith
16:44 Unsouled
19:30 Death Trash
21:03 There Is No Light
23:52 Outro

also big thanks for help from:
Hugo Junstrand for the cool "steam dumpster diving" animation as well as the music in the intro: https://twitter.com/HugoJunstrand
Onua for creating the SFM pose of the knight in the thumbnail: https://twitter.com/Odynom
